citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4 pm to 4:30 pm on
December 7, 2022. The inspector was informed by owner's spouse that licensee was at work and would not be home for
a couple more hours. Owner's spouse stated that she was not available due to sick children in the house. No other
authorized person was available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4 pm to 4:30 pm on 
December 7, 2022. The inspector was informed by owner's spouse that licensee was at work and would not be home for 
a couple more hours. Owner's spouse stated that she was not available due to sick children in the house. No other 
authorized person was available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
